description.item: Responsible for uploading the app to the PlayStore and ensuring its smooth functioning.

Developed and implemented various new features, including treatment of APIs, refactoring of existing codes, authentication of users, chat functionality, video player and secure payment processing with Stripe 3D secure.
Maintained up-to-date knowledge of best practices and emerging technologies in mobile app development.
Ability to work effectively as part of a remote team, demonstrating excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
Collaborate with the team to create new features and screens for Lojong's mobile app.
Contribute to the migration of native Android to Flutter, following the MVVM architecture proposed by the team.
Ensure code quality and maintainability by following best practices and participating in code reviews.
Communicate effectively with team members to ensure the timely delivery of new features.
Experience with providing technical assistance and mentor in the context of mobile app development.
Participate in the Flutter interview process for new projects
Ensure code quality and maintainability by making code reviews
Collaborated with a project manager and director to develop a mobile app for license plate detection project during 5 months using Dart / Flutter.
Integrated Firebase's Machine Learning Kit for camera-based license plate detection.
Integrated APIs for data retrieval and manipulation.
Ensured high-quality code and adherence to best practices.
Developed a mobile app from scratch using Flutter for pet owners.
Implemented features such as login process, password recovery, Google Maps integration with geolocation API, pet cards with pet information, and more.
Communicated effectively with the client to understand their needs and provide regular progress updates.
